attributes.action: Reduce the cost of tax to 4x4s after they have help the nation during the snow
attributes.additional_details: With the rise of tax for these vehicles it seems that those that have helped keep the country running smoother are also being punished by these increases. With tax rates already at a high for these vehicles it doesnt seem fair.
attributes.background: During the snow storms that hit the uk in march, many 4x4 drivers have assisted in removing blocked roads, getting medical staff to hospitals, carers to nursing homes and even shopping runs for the elderly. Without the help of these people and their vehicles, many people/hospitals would of suffered
